welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Harvey, a charming city known for its friendly community and beautiful landscapes! We invite you to wander through our streets, taste our local cuisine, and immerse yourself in the rich culture of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lakefront Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lakefront Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

airports.airport_name: Louis Armstrong New Orl√©ans International Airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse serves domestic flights for Delta Air Lines and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse serves domestic flights for American Airlines, Southwest Airlines, and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: This concourse serves international flights for Air Canada, British Airways, and Condor.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
